title: I have a Pixel 4a, and the volume is too low on my Airpods.
content:
I have a Pixel 4a, and the volume is too low on my Airpods. I've tried disabling absolute volume, but that doesn't have any effect (even after restarting, forgetting airpods, etc).

Any suggestions? I feel like I'm being forced to buy Pixel Buds, which is really disturbing. I'd rather return my phone.
